name: Nepeta Leijon Theme
description:
I am completely aware that due to a recent coding change in the logo for Tumblr, the custom one that comes with this theme isn't working. I've removed it until I can figure out how to fix it. I apologize for the inconvenience. 

A theme based around Nepeta Leijon, a character from the MSPA comic Homestuck. 

Art found here:
http://jacklerules.deviantart.com/art/Nepeta-Leijon-298059242
